docblock.description: Default page for views with no controllers - Prints the view without any process
Default page for views with no controllers - Prints the view without any process

docblock.long-description:
CLASS ctrl_page_index EXTENDS ctrl_tpl_page {
   protected $mode_gpc_login = array(
         '_POST' => array('username' , 'password')
      );
   public function process_mode_login($gpc) {
      extract($gpc);
      member::login($username,$password);
   }
}

The controller template class for ajaxed resources
docblock.long-description:
# /ajax/suggestions?mode=title&q=about
CLASS ctrl_page_ajax__suggestions EXTENDS ctrl_tpl_page {
   public $gpc_mode_title = array(
         '_GET' => array( 'q' )
      );
   public function process_mode_title($gpc) {
      # Imaginary model "page"
      $suggestions = page::get_suggestions($gpc['q']);
      $this->assign('suggestions',$suggestions);
   }
}

A phpmailer object directly integrated with a controller

#includes/classes/ctrl_page_register.class.php
CLASS ctrl_page_register EXTENDS ctrl_tpl_page {
   public $mode_gpc_register = array( '_POST' => array('username');
   public function process_mode_register($gpc) {
      # ... registered successfully
      $this->assign('member', member::add_new($gpc));
      $mailer = new ctrl_mailer_register($this);
      $mailer->execute();
   }
}

#includes/classes/ctrl_mailer_register.class.php
CLASS ctrl_mailer_register EXTENDS ctrl_mailer_abstract {
}

#views/mailers/register.tpl
{*SMARTY*}
Hello {$member->username} you are successfully registered!

docblock.long-description: This is my prayer for this project: Dear Lord God the Great I am, I pray unto you in the name of your son Jesus, let your holy spirit guide this prayer as I exhort it through the codes done by your wisdom given to me. Thank you for the guidance you've given us, the wisdom, the patience and the visions you. Thank you for the ideas you've given to me through the whispers of your Holy Spirit. Thank you for the opportunity you've given to me to make this project. Thank you for our company, our bosses and our team mates and office mates and friends. Thank you for our job, our position and all the blessings you give to us through your children. Forgive us for our pride, for our ego, for our boasting and for our self-reliance. Forgive us for not thanking you in every goal met, task completed and bugs fixed. Forgive those that wants to do us harm and those that already did. and please give us the strength to forgive them too. I pray unto you to give us more faith in every thing we do, after every tasks, after every version. Guide us with your Holy Spirit and teach us how to do things great. Let your hands be our hands and let your mind be our mind. Give us wisdom, patience and humility in everything we do. Lord please continue to bless me and continue to use me as a proof your existence, let the wisdom you've given me be light to world, not as an excuse to unbelief. Let this project be fruitful and useful for all who use it. Let there projects be protected from all harm and be useful to there clients. Let every developer who will contribute to this project be blessed and be gifted be wisdom. Give us the peace no one can understand, even on the toughest problem we face. Let every one who is involved on this project be blessed and let everything I prayed for be applied to them as well. All these I pray in the name of your Son, Jesus.

tag.name: param
tag.description: an array that points to the active symbol table at the point the error occurred. In other words, errcontext will contain an array of every variable that existed in the scope the error was triggered in. User error handler must not modify error context.

Validates $field $value Redeclare this on each class to be able to uniformize values
docblock.long-description:
static function validate_field($field,&$value) {
   case 'username':
      return preg_match('/^\w+$/',$value);
   break;
   case 'full_name':
      $value = trim($full_name);
      $value = preg_replace('/\s+/',' ',$value);
   default:
      return true;
}

model_auth object class An abstract class for authenticated models example: members, admins
docblock.long-description:
CLASS user EXTENDS model_auth {
   const TABLE = 'users';
   const TABLE_PK = 'uid';
   const USERNAME_FIELD = 'username';
   const PASSWORD_FIELD = 'password';
   static function hash_password($password) {
      return $password; # unencrypted
   }
}

docblock.description: model_auth object class An abstract class for authenticated models example: members, admins
docblock.long-description:
CLASS user EXTENDS model_auth {
   const TABLE = 'users';
   const TABLE_PK = 'uid';
   const USERNAME_FIELD = 'username';
   const PASSWORD_FIELD = 'password';
   static function hash_password($password) {
      return $password; # unencrypted
   }
}

A class for models (tables) that represent photos
docblock.long-description:
CLASS user_photo EXTENDS model_image_rwd {
   const TABLE = 'user_photos';
   const TABLE_PK = 'photo_id';

   public function file_path_name() {
       return add::config()->images_dir.'/'.$this->user_id.'-'.$this->id().'.jpg';
   }

   public function img_src() {
       return add::config()->images_path.'/'.$this->user_id.'-'.$this->id().'.jpg';
   }
}

docblock.description: A class for models (tables) that represent photos
docblock.long-description:
CLASS user_photo EXTENDS model_image_rwd {
   const TABLE = 'user_photos';
   const TABLE_PK = 'photo_id';

   public function file_path_name() {
       return add::config()->images_dir.'/'.$this->user_id.'-'.$this->id().'.jpg';
   }

   public function img_src() {
       return add::config()->images_path.'/'.$this->user_id.'-'.$this->id().'.jpg';
   }
}

property.default:
array( CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array( 'User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.9.2.8) Gecko/20100722 Firefox/3.6.8 ( .NET4.0E)', 'Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8', 'Accept-Language: en-us,en;q=0.5', 'Accept-Encoding: gzip,deflate', 'Accept-Charset: ISO-8859-1,utf-8;q=0.7,*;q=0.7', 'Keep-Alive: 115', 'Connection: keep-alive' ), CURLOPT_AUTOREFERER => true, CURLOPT_PROXYTYPE => CURLPROXY_HTTP,
# set this to ip:port formated IP (e.g. 123.123.123.123:321) CURLOPT_PROXY => null, # set this to true to enable proxy CURLOPT_HTTPPROXYTUNNEL => false, CURLOPT_ENCODING => 'gzip,deflate',
# Follow redirects CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => false, # How many redirects to follow CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 5,
# Time outs CURLOPT_CONNECTTIMEOUT => 10, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 60, )

Debug timer class Probably shouldn't be abstract
docblock.long-description:
CLASS debug_timer EXTENDS add_debug_timer {
}

$timer = debug_timer::start("Start");
sleep(3);
$timer->lap("After 3 seconds");
sleep(5);
$timer->lap("After 5 seconds");
$timer->print_all_laps();

tag.name: param
tag.description: The search filter can be simple or advanced, using boolean operators in the format described in the LDAP documentation (see the » Netscape Directory SDK for full information on filters).

tag.name: param
tag.description: An array of the required attributes, e.g. array("mail", "sn", "cn"). Note that the "dn" is always returned irrespective of which attributes types are requested.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Should be set to 1 if only attribute types are wanted. If set to 0 both attributes types and attribute values are fetched which is the default behaviour.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Enables you to limit the count of entries fetched. Setting this to 0 means no limit.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Sets the number of seconds how long is spend on the search. Setting this to 0 means no limit.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Specifies how aliases should be handled during the search
